repository.description: URL of the Git repository containing the module

revision.description: Branch, tag, or commit to be checked out

pull_frequency.description: The frequency to pull the repository for updates in duration format.

default.description: If true, this connection is used as the default when none is specified

basic_auth.description: Credentials for basic authentication if needed

password_file.description: Path to a file containing the password

ssh_key.description: Provides SSH key details for secure connections

key_file.description: Path to the SSH private key file

passphrase.description: Passphrase for the SSH private key

name.description: The name to use for the module

path.description: The path in the repository where the module is stored.

connection.description: The alias of the connection to use, if not specified the default connection is used

targets.description: Additional arguments to be passed to the module's Kubernetes component

scrape.description: Additional arguments to be passed to the module's scrape component

extraRelabelingRules.description: Additional relabeling rules for the modules discovery.relabel component

extraMetricRelabelingRules.description: Additional relabeling rules for the modules prometheus.relabel component
